content:
I need to distances between pairs of Arrays, and a naive implementation is taking too long. Is there something high level already in Lean for this?

I can speed up by using Task to compute concurrently if there is nothing ready to use.
Could you provide a MWE of your code that is too slow?
This was my misdiagnosis. All the time taken was in startup of the lean process.
Siddhartha Gadgil has marked this topic as resolved.
